relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Totally safe as I never leave my home to go to campus.
Those who can't or don't prefer to commute. Gas is almost five dollars a gallon and I never have been on campus yet. I have save lots of cash in gas money alone!
Study from my pc at home.

N U is perfect for my pocket book. I will have a surplus of funds since I will qualify for Pell, SEOG, and Cal Grant! There is always students loans if I need more to go on. The value is outstanding at N U.
Go to the beach or the mountains.
I cook my own food because I like my food better than paying for someone else's. It tastes way better and the nutritional value can't be beat.
I camp at home. My home, not folks. So I don't live on campus. I have my own place.

Challenging at first; like riding a bike uphill. When you find your own pace, your momentum carries you. From there your will breeze right in to a new degree and a feeling of accomplishment like no other.
Enroll. Apply yourself. Then, graduate to a better future.
N U is challenging. The accelerated pace of the online courses helps me stay focused. Five stars for N U bringing me that much closer to my Bachelors degree.

textAfterTable: i found a great beginning to my education at national university with my admissions counselor. he was able to refer me to my financial counselor and plan my academic schedule completely. In three sentences national university has a comprehensive administration set up that makes registration and educational planning easier than i've seen at any other institution. i was able to become enrolled and begin my education path easily after a 10 year break, with classes that weren't over my head and instructors that answered all my questions and were very approachable. i would definitely recommend national university to any of my friends or family for furthering their education. Login to rate or flag the reviews Andrew from La Quinta, CA 05/21/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 56 Categories Comments Campus Safety State of the Art campuses.
